redirect_list.description: name of URL list with redirector domains (empty for disabling resolving redirects)

timeout.description: timeout for resolving redirects in seconds

substitution_list.description: name of lexical expression list with URL substitutions (empty for disabling replacing URL parts)

annotation_text.description: name of annotation applied to modified text body (empty for disabling annotating text body)

annotation_html.description: name of annotation applied to modified html body (empty for disabling annotating html body)
